Class ApiaryMother

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.data.model.mothers.ApiaryMother

  • public class ApiaryMother
extends java.lang.Object
    Mother class for apiaries. Using Object Mother, Test Data Builder and Builder patter.
